ideology: Extermination of all pirates rather than arrest and imprisonment, viewing the traditional Marine approach as too lenient
goals: Eliminate all pirates from the seas
Establish a new order based on Z's militant philosophy
Reject the World Government's compromises with pirates (particularly the Shichibukai system)

keyMoments.title: Internal Hierarchy Established
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals how the Neo Marine hierarchy was determined through the five-hour battle between Ain and Shuzo, with Ain winning the position of second-in-command.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the power structure and internal dynamics of the Neo Marines.

keyMoments.title: Shuzo Defeats Marine Forces
keyMoments.description: Shuzo demonstrates the Neo Marines' complete rejection of traditional Marine authority by defeating Vice Admiral Momonga and his forces.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Neo Marines' willingness to fight both pirates and traditional Marines to achieve their goals.

reputation: A rogue military organization led by former Marine Admiral Z, known for their extreme methods and rejection of the World Government's authority

trivia.fact: The Neo Marines are a non-canon organization created specifically for One Piece Film: Z and its prologue arc.
The organization was formed after the World Government appointed Weeble as a Shichibukai, which Z viewed as a betrayal since Weeble had killed many of Z's students.
The Neo Marines use a hierarchy based on combat prowess, as shown by Ain and Shuzo's five-hour battle to determine the second-in-command position.
